ocrProcessingStep.processingStepDescription: Alto coordinates refer to the deskewed TIFF file. To convert point (x, y) to original image (TIFF or JP2) apply transformation matrix T=(m00, m01, m10, m11, b0, b1) using the rule: T * (x,y) = (m00 * x + m01 * y + b0), (m10 * x + m11 * y + b1)
